name: pjcoi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c2), c0))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ (c0 ∈ ~H →(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c2))` c0)=((projh ` c1)`((projh ` c2)` c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c2), c0))))
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba, chba)
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c2), chba, chba)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ~H →(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c2))` c0)=((projh ` c1)`((projh ` c2)` c0)))
⊣ ((projh ` c1): ~H → ~H)
⊣ ((projh ` c2): ~H → ~H)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c2), c0))))
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba, chba)
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c2), chba, chba)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ~H →(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c2))` c0)=((projh ` c1)`((projh ` c2)` c0)))
⊣ ((projh ` c1): ~H → ~H)
⊣ ((projh ` c2): ~H → ~H)

body.origin:
|- wf(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba, chba)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c2), c0))))
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c2), chba, chba)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ~H →(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c2))` c0)=((projh ` c1)`((projh ` c2)` c0)))
⊣ ((projh ` c2): ~H → ~H)
⊣ c1 ∈ CH

body.origin:
|- wf(cfv(cpjh, c2), chba, chba)
-| wcel(c2, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c2), c0))))
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| wcel(c2, cch)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ~H →(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c2))` c0)=((projh ` c1)`((projh ` c2)` c0)))
⊣ c1 ∈ CH
⊣ c2 ∈ CH
